Docs.summary: Provides XAML language support API for UWP apps and the Windows Runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This namespace documentation contains only .NET projections of Windows Runtime (WinRT) types where the projection differs from the WinRT type. To see the complete list of types for this namespace, see [Windows.UI.Xaml.Markup](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.markup) in the UWP API reference.
